name: Fluffy Jump Ball
description:
Enjoy the new Fluffy balls game overcoming the levels and collecting prizes along the way. The more you raise the faster the game will go, testing your abilities.

Collect along the way numerous prizes and superpowers that will help you complete the levels and get a higher score.

Choose from a wide variety of balls and continue to beat levels with cute Fluffy the easy and entertaining game to play.

How to play:
- Turn Left and Right your phone to move
- Pick up Coins and Superpowers on the way up
- Unlock more ball colors with Coins you win
